common_pitfalls.title: Common Pitfalls to Avoid
content: Avoid solutions that come from nowhere
Don't make red herrings too obvious
Resist having characters be unrealistically obtuse
Don't forget to resolve all the clues planted
Avoid making the solution feel random

highlights: Clues and deduction drive the narrative
